descripcion:
Ultrasol Premium 16-5-16 is specifically designed for crops started in floatbeds. Perfect for greenhousestarted tobacco and vegetables; can also be used on a wide range of crops and growing conditions. Urea-free, with a very high nitrate to ammonium ratio. Extra sulfur and magnesium eliminates the need for epsom salts. Chelated micronutrients.

DERIVED FROM: Potassium Nitrate, Ammonium Nitrate, Ammonium Phosphate, Magnesium Sulfate, Iron EDDHA, Iron EDTA, Manganese EDTA, Copper EDTA, Zinc EDTA, Boric Acid, Sodium Molybdate. F1367
Chlorine (Cl), Maximum ......................0.50%

POTENTIAL BASICITY: 285 lbs calcium carbonate equivalent per ton.
